Name: Cultivators Wardrobe
Desc:
[作者]
    Beathoven
[简介]
Clothing for Outer Disciples to do their Jobs better (Farming,Crafting etc.)

Clothing for Inner Disciples that boosts Qi and Cultivation.

Midgame clothing for even better attributes.

Its supposed to be kinda balanced. 

42 Clothing Items
1 Sewing Table
1 Loom
5 Toolkits
More standard cloth colors

Not all bonuses are listed in the Item desciptions.

Update: (16.1)
Added: New Cloth sets with element (Law) affinity, Katana in Forge and a new Metal Bar.

More cloth and colors
